programmes.show_description: Blood-sucking Hammer horror with Christopher Lee. A young man and his girlfriend travel to Dracula's mountain-top castle in search of his brother who disappeared in mysterious circumstances. (1970)
Thriller with Western star James Coburn. A professor about to start a new job as a government adviser must eliminate all traces of his past as an industrial spy - with deadly consequences. (1974)
Post-apocalyptic thriller with Bill Paxton. Two officers transport a murderer to prison across ravaged lands, only for the criminal to be kidnapped by a mercenary hoping to claim the reward. (1989)
When Challenger makes a windmill to produce electricity, ball lightning creates a portal allowing a helicopter to come through from the year 2000 - bringing up the question of time travel. S2, Ep3/22
Put the pleasure back into shopping from the comfort of your home and choose from a selection of innovative products.
Sci-fi action starring Fay Gauthier. Aliens invade Earth and give the planet's population an ultimatum - emigrate to a new planet, or be killed... (2016)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!

Sci-fi romp through space. When the leader of the evil Coalition threatens to annihilate a planet for its resources, his daughter turns against him to fight for what is right. (2019)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
Chuck Norris fights crime and helps the community as the eponymous Walker. A deadly new designer drug sends Walker and Trivette out into the night. S2, Ep3/25
Monster-movie mashup starring Brian Krause (Charmed). WWII pilots are blown off course during a storm and left to battle prehistoric giants on a mysterious island. (2008)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
When the adventurers end up in a haunted castle they feel compelled to re-enact an intriguing murder mystery which eventually leaves their fate in the hands of Challenger. S2, Ep4/22
Colt helps a computer genius who has been framed for murder by the head of an illegal intelligence network. S2, Ep9

Thriller with Brad Pitt. A New York cop discovers his Irish lodger is an IRA gunman on a mission to obtain missiles, and is torn between turning him in or respecting their new-found friendship. (1996)
Undersea thriller with Gary Busey. A group of Navy Seals set out to save a kidnapped scientist, but the operation does not go as planned and they are taken hostage by enemy forces. (1996)
Gripping war drama with Shia LaBeouf. When a US Marine returns home from Afghanistan to discover his hometown destroyed and his family missing, he sets out on a desperate quest to find them. (2015)

Chuck Norris is Walker in this modern high kicking martial arts western. Walker is wounded after confronting ranchers who were going to kill federally protected horses. S2, Ep4/25
Post-apocalyptic action with Dean Cain. When a meteor strike leaves the Earth covered in ice, a group of survivors set out across a desolate landscape to find a device that can save mankind. (2004)

Colt's American football-playing cousin is kidnapped by a crooked Army sergeant and forced to boost the fortunes of an ailing team. S2, Ep10
Martial arts thriller with Jean-Claude Van Damme. A martial arts fighter seeks revenge on the Thai kickboxer who brutally defeated his brother in a fight, leaving him paralysed. (1989)
